tasks.label: Compile All UI Files
tasks.command: pyside6-uic form.ui -o ui_form.py && pyside6-uic cocktailCard.ui -o ui_cocktailCard.py && pyside6-uic bottleParameter.ui -o ui_bottleParameter.py && pyside6-uic bottleDialog.ui -o ui_bottleDialog.py && pyside6-uic dispenserControl.ui -o ui_dispenserControl.py && pyside6-uic ingredientCard.ui -o ui_ingredientCard.py && pyside6-uic ingredientCardDialog.ui -o ui_ingredientCardDialog.py
